mapper.select: SELECT ID as "id" , HOSTNAME as "hostName" , OCCRRNC_DE as "occrrncDe" , RQESTER_ID as "rqesterId" , RQESTER_IP as "rqesterIp" , SVC_NM as "svcNm" , METHOD_NM as "methodNm" , PROCESS_SE_CODE as "processSeCode" , PROCESS_TIME as "processTime" , ERROR_SE as "errorSe" , ERROR_CO as "errorCo" , ERROR_CODE as "errorCode" FROM COMTNSYSLOG

SELECT OCCRRNC_DT as "occrrncDt" , HOSTNAME as "hostName" , SVC_NM as "svcNm" , METHOD_NM as "methodNm" , CREAT_CO as "creatCo" , UPDT_CO as "updtCo" , RDCNT as "rdCnt" , DELETE_CO as "deleteCo" , ERROR_CO as "errorCo" FROM COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNSYSLOG WHERE DATE_FORMAT(OCCRRNC_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(ADDDATE(SYSDATE(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d')
